text:
@GregAbbott_TX I am not political, but this is an easy one. Trace this all back to Trump and Republican governors. In a mad rush to lick Trumps balls, they listened to him and Mike Pence. 

Governor Abbott (blood on hands) was caught on tape on this topic. Lawsuit time. https://t.co/J88KW77fC3
